> =A0<OLD>
>
> Celeron transmitted the access codes which authorized him to=
 land at the Predecon dock.=A0 The doors on the top of the hanger-like stru=
cture folded open and landing lights turned on.=A0 1 min to landing.

<NEW>=


The jets continued on thier turning arc, thier movements smooth and
preci=
se, thier after burners glowing slightly with the increased
thrust. They sw=
ung around and oriented on the shuttle, thier sensors
scanning over it for =
a moment, and then, as if noting the ship's
location and intent, the jets b=
egan to move off, banking over to
continue on their flight over and around =
the outside edge of the city.

> <OLD>
>
> He looked out at the city.=A0 Al=
though he was a Predecon, he'd never really felt comfortable here.=A0 The b=
ase felt like home, but in the city outside, he was never sure from day-to-=
day whether he was going to be welcomed or stabbed in the back.

<NEW>

The=
 city looked almost dim with all the soot and debris that coated
it. Worker=
 drones moved along its streets transporting natural ores
from one place to=
 another. Much of the city was dark, littered with
dark allyways, dead end =
streets and dark pockets where neferious deals
of all sorts could take plac=
e.

A few twin rotored helicoptors rose up over the city, thier watchful
be=
ams straying over the darker alleys. The curious thing is that these
choppe=
rs, like the jets, registered as security and as Predacon, but
there was no=
 Bushido IFF codes coming from them, they were definitly
something else. Al=
so like the jets, the choppers paid little attention
to the incomming shutt=
le. Something interesting was happening in the
city, even the criminal elem=
ent was becoming more unified, more
focused.

(TAG)

> OOC: So if they're s=
ecurity forces, wouldn't they be Bushido Predecon NPC's?=A0 Or have local c=
rime syndicates formed patrol squads.=A0 Anyway, I don't need an answer, ju=
st musing.

OOC: No problem, I appreciate the input, your knowledge of this=
 city
is larger than mine. I am just running off my own imagination. I am
u=
nsure if you guys had fleshed anything out here.

Preston
